Text: It's the only format currently available for leeches. Take it or leave it.

Thanks very much for the upload, I've been looking forward to reading this. To convert to PDF, download and install DjView (it's freeware), then "file", "export as" etc. The pages are scanned images, not text, so there's no way to make this readable on a Kindle (type is too small). But it looks fine in PDF.
